name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Jamel BAILEY, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Jamel BAILEY, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 6th day of July, 2012, the Petition for Leave to File Petition for Allowance of Appeal Nunc Pro Tune is GRANTED. Counsel of record is directed to file a Petition for Allowance of Appeal within 30 days of this order. Cf Pa.R.Crim.P. 120(B) (“[cjounsel for a defendant may not withdraw his or her appearance except by leave of court.”)
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
47 A.3d 1175
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Jamel BAILEY, Petitioner.
No. 17 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 6, 2012.
